homes_overviews: Very private family and dog friendly former crofters bungalow sitting on a croft under the spectacular Trotternish Ridge and Quiraing in North East Skye. one mile from beaches and 2 miles from village with shops, cafes and takeaways

The pods are set on the hillside behind the Cowshed Boutique Bunkhouse and enjoy amazing views across the Uig Bay. In a wonderful location to explore the Isle of Skye, and perfectly situated for enjoying spectacular sunsets.

We are located just off the main road into Portree our location offers sea views and we are 10 Mins walk to the centre of the village. This listing is for Room 7 This room can either be a Super king Double or the bed can be split offering a Twin option please advise at booking your choice

A two room apartment ten minutes walk from Portree town centre and harbour with range of local amenities from top class restaurants to sea eagle trips. A great location from where you can explore the beautiful and magical Isle of Skye...

Our bungalow is at the end of a quiet cul de sac, surrounded by trees. The River Leasgeary is at the end of the garden, and we are only five minutes walk from the centre of Portree, with its shops, pubs and restaurants. We have off street parking , a private decking area to relax on and high speed free wifi. The harbour is a short walk away, where guests can enjoy watching the boats, or even going for a ride to see dolphins and sea eagles, or enjoy the view over to the Isle of Raasay.

homes_name: Taigh Glas Studio "Dreamy Views All Round Amazing"
homes_overviews: Taigh Glas Studio is a private part of our eco conscious newbuild, with its own front door. The studio sleeps 1-2 people only. (No additional beds). It is a compact space with king size double bed (5ft wide x 6ft 6ins long). You can have continental breakfast or self cater, as the studio offers a well appointed kitchen, and floor to ceiling corner windows to view the beautiful world renowned Waternish sunsets. The bathroom floor is heated. We are LGBTQIA friendly. We supply Continental breakfast
A short drive away from many of Skye's popular attractions and Dunvegan, where you will find local shops, cafes and restaurants.

homes_name: Portree - No.30, Isle & Rest, â€˜Storr' Room 2
homes_overviews: A short walk from the centre of Portree, Skye's main fishing village, No.30 is the perfect resting place to base yourself in warmth and comfort to explore the wonders of this incredible and magical island.
Continental breakfast is included with Gluten free options available.

Your own piece of tranquility in our Little Skye Bothy, with outstanding views to the loch and the mountains. The pod has kitchen facilities, 2 ring hob and microwave (no oven). Tea, coffee and sugar are provided. There is a shower room, an ottoman double bed and a sofa bed for an extra guest. There is an oil filled heater, table and chairs, TV for watching DVD's (there is no signal for local or national channels) and wifi is available
It is the ideal base for those who are planning to tour the island. There are plenty of restuarants to choose from where you will be served local produce and freshly caught seafood.

homes_name: Double room, B&B, Staffin, near Old Man of Storr
homes_overviews: We are located a 20 minute drive north of Portree and within easy reach of all the iconic places of North Skye. The Storr and Quiraing are both a 10 minute drive away, Kilt Rock only a few minutes walk. The Dinosaur museum a stroll away.
Quiet location, off the main road and only an 8 minute walk into the centre of the village. Parking on site.

Ensuite room in our newly renovated croft house in Garafad, close to the centre of Staffin, with view of the Trotternish Ridge, The Quiraing & Staffin Bay. Our aim is to provide our guests with the feeling of "staying with friends" 2 licensed restaurants, bus stop & local shops within walking distance. *No service charge

homes_name: 32 PRIMROSE HILL, PORTREE ,ISLE OF SKYE Room 1
homes_overviews: Free Parking on private drive
Small but perfectly formed, we offer boutique accommodation with fantastic breakfasts for 2 (or 3 adults travelling together).

homes_name: Kestrel Pod at No.7 Borve 4 miles from Portree
homes_overviews: Brand new pod in a beautiful rural but central location! Kestrel Pod is a brand new pod only 4 miles from Portree so is in an ideal central location and is the perfect base for exploring the whole island whilst only being a short drive from shops,restaurants and pubs. Enjoy the countryside in peace and quiet. Walk up to the top of Borve Hill for spectacular views.Pod has a double bed and a sofa bed. Sofa bed is suitable for 1 or 2 children.
Portree is just 30 minutes away by car and features a selection of restaurants,gifts shops,cinema/theatre and Boat trips from Portree Harbour to see porpoise,seals, otters and sea eagles.

homes_name: Skye Eco Bells Glamping - Cosy Island Cabin 1
homes_overviews: Furnished cosy cabin sleeps up to 3 in a double and single bed. Sit by your outdoor firepit after exploring the beauty of Skye or relax in the comfort of your cabin warmed by the wood burning stove. Compost toilet, the unique greenhouse shower and sociable Hub and Shack are all part of the off grid experience. Up to 2 well behaved dogs are welcome by prior arrangement for an additional Â£10 for one dog and Â£15 for two.
* We've a dog who likes to woof but she's very friendly:)

The pods are set on the hillside behind the Cowshed Boutique Bunkhouse and enjoy amazing views across the Uig Bay. In a wonderful location to explore the Isle of Skye, and perfectly situated for enjoying spectacular sunsets.

A short walk from the centre of Portree, Skye's main fishing village, No.30 is the perfect resting place to base yourself in warmth and comfort to explore the wonders of this incredible and magical island.
Complimentary wine etc for 3 nights and more

Ensuite room in our newly renovated croft house in Garafad, close to the centre of Staffin, with view of the Trotternish Ridge, The Quiraing & Staffin Bay. Our aim is to provide our guests with the feeling of "staying with friends" 2 licensed restaurants, bus stop & local shops within walking distance. *No service charge,

homes_name: Claigan Bed and Breakfast, Isle of Skye, Scotland.
homes_overviews: Breakfast is continental with fantastic views of Broadford Bay, served at 9 or earlier by arrangement.

At 40 Bernisdale Skeabost Bridge we offer you a comfy Bedroom to rest your head for your stay in Skye, Double bed Shower over bath - en suite. There is also a private lounge area and tv for you to relax in all to yourselves. All this on the first floor of our house here at 40 Bernisdale. We no longer offer a full breakfast but there is Tea, coffee, hot chocolate and biscuits provided. A Porridge pot and a piece of fruit if your hungry first thing!

homes_name: R7: King OR Twin : En-Suite :An-Airidh B&B PORTREE
homes_overviews: * THE BEDS IN THIS ROOM CAN BE LINKED - PLEASE LET US KNOW IF YOU PREFER A TWIN ( TWO SINGLE BEDS ) OR A KING SIZE ( 1 KING SIZE BED ) *
We look forward to welcoming you on holiday to the gorgeous Isle Of Skye!

Newly decorated double bedroom. 10 minutes walk from portree center and 5 minutes from main supermarket. Fibre optic broadband,full sky go,mini fridge, kettle an tea an coffee making facilities and free parking.

5 Harport is a waterside house on the banks of loch Harport, opposite the famous Talisker distillery in the beautiful village of Carbost, centrally located on Skye. Tastefully decorated, it has stunning views out over the loch to the Cuillin mountains especially from the elevated decking. Close to local amenities including shop with petrol station, The Old Inn pub which serves food all day and has live traditional music three nights a week. 10 minutes to the cuillins and 20 miles to Portree.

Our little chalet is in a quiet & beautifull location with views over the sea. From inside in the spring & summer a buzard nest can be seen. It's very confortable with everything you need for a self-catering stay (bedding & towels).

homes_name: Taigh Rob Room 2 Hairy Coo ( Twin room )

homes_overviews: The bathroom will be shared with one other person.

homes_name: Otterburn - relaxing self catering on Skye
homes_overviews: Our pod nestles in amongst the trees adjacent to our house within the peaceful crofting township of Lower Breakish on the beautiful Isle of Skye. Sea and hill views can be seen across open fields and wonderful sunsets can be enjoyed on long summer nights. The pod is an ideal base for touring both Skye and Wester Ross.
Breakfast is included in the price.

A cosy glamping wigwam for a family of 4 or 3 adult friends. Part of Whitewave: Skye's Outdoor Centre, this scenic destination is perfect for friends, couples and families wanting to make the most of the surrounding landscape. Unfortunately, we have no wi-fi on site.

homes_name: Taigh Rob Room 2 Hairy Coo ( Twin room )

homes_overviews: These luxury pods are set on the hillside behind the Cowshed Boutique Bunkhouse and enjoy amazing views across the Uig Bay and Skye.
Sorry no children or pets (a cat lives here).

homes_name: Feochan B&B Portree Skye - Double Room En-Suite
homes_overviews: Beautiful B&B set in a Stunning Prime Location in Pretty Portree - Isle of Skye - a very warm welcome awaits you

The Bed and Breakfast is on the shore of a sea loch. It is eight miles from Portree where you will find shops and restaurants.. Youâ€™ll love my place because of The privacy and solitude. Guests have their own key to the private BB unit. Direct loch access for kayakers and walkers. BB is brand new with a large picture window affording views of the outer isles. Home baking is supplied as are tea and coffee making facilities.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
There is plenty parking spaces at my home.

homes_name: The Thistle Room in Clachan Manse Bed & Breakfast
homes_overviews: Our beautiful Thistle room decorated by Tery with her own designs. It is situated in the annex alongside the main house and has an ensuite. Our place sits on the banks of Applecross Bay overlooking the Cuillins on Skye. We are under a mile's walk to the famous Applecross Inn and Applecross Walled Garden where you can sample amazing seafood. There are plenty of walks and beaches to explore on your doorstep here. Breakfast is included in the price; we offer a full scottish or continental.

homes_name: Glamping, Willows Rd, Borneskitaig, Skye IV51 9WS
homes_overviews: Relax, enjoy the silence, nature, landscape and the beautiful walks on the North tip of Skye.

homes_name: Double en suite bedroom with private lounge
homes_overviews: Large double room with en suite bathroom. Private lounge & dining area for guests with Nespresso coffee machine and TV with Sky satellite TV.

Double room in a traditional croft house with ensuite shower room. A "continental +" breakfast (Tea, coffee, toast and preserves, cereals, fruit, fruit juice) with the option of scrambled eggs and smoked salmon, waffles with warm berries and avocado on sourdough toast! Fresh white linen and towels, bathrobes, hairdryer, 32" HD TV, orthopaedic beds and a welcome tray with tea and coffee making facilities. Enthusiastic welcome to all from a friendly rough collie and his owner!

homes_name: Bracken Brae B&B (Room 4) - Luxury room, Sea view!
homes_overviews: Situated on a hill we have unsurpassed, panoramic views across the sea to the Mainland. At our brand new luxury annex you can relax in large, stylish and beautiful bedrooms with your own private outdoor covered deck, and luxury shower room with underfloor heating and a luxuriant hot waterfall shower.

Situated just 8 miles from Portree, Bothan Nan Ron is a modern, romantic, stylish self catering cabin. Guests have direct access to Loch Treaslane where there is a resident seal colony and sightings of otters and sea eagles are common.. The cabin is furnished to a high specification and includes a modern bathroom, mini kitchen, antique sleigh bed and a large picture window with fantastic views across to the Western Isles.

Bijou but perfectly formed, the cabin is light and airy, with views to the mountains and the sea. At high tide you will be just a few metres from the water's edge so it's a perfect spot to while away the hours.
We are situated 15 miles from Portree and 8miles from Dunvegan.we have two hotels locally which both serve excellent food.

homes_name: Glamping, Willows Rd, Borneskitaig, Skye IV51 9WS
Bracken Brae B&B (Room 4) - Luxury room, Sea view!

homes_overviews: The lodges are 5 x 3 metres in size and are designed to be compact and cosy. Each lodge consists of a sleeping area, en-suite bathroom with shower. A small TV is located on the wall of the sleeping area.

homes_name: Loch Eyre Shepherd Hut with Log Burning stove.
homes_overviews: Loch Eyre Shepherd Hut (situated in the grounds of Loch Eyre House) is perfectly positioned to create a get away from it all bolt hole for your trip to Skye. We are situated in between Portree and Uig, which makes a great location to tour the island, or for a stop over en route to the Outer Isles.
We can provide a travel cot only for babies we do not have a bed for older children

homes_name: Papillon Bed and Breakfast Kingsize Room 2
homes_overviews: All guest rooms enjoy stunning views overlooking Loch Vatten and the Macleods Tables Mountains.

My place is a family home within walking distance of all of Dunvegan's amenities, in the heart of the village with a big garden setting us back from the road. We are in an excellent location for exploring the island, and I can offer lots of tips for places to go and see. We are well suited to solo travelers, couples or families, and love meeting new people from different walks of life.

homes_name: Feochan B&B Portree Skye - Cosy Double En-Suite
homes_overviews: Beautiful B&B set in a Stunning Prime Location in Pretty Portree - Isle of Skye. A very warm welcome awaits you.
A lovely cosy room with a double bed and private shower room,wifi ,tea and coffee making facilities and we also cook a Scottish breakfast

homes_name: Mrs Mac's BnB Kilmuir, Isle of Skye IV51 9WS
homes_overviews: Please check our location as we are close to the most northerly point on Skye. Your room is upstairs with shared shower room. We are the first house on your right as you turn into the only street in Kilmuir, situated in the crofting township of Borneskitaig at the North tip of Skye. Ideal location for walking, photography, bird watching & fishing. We are 10 minutes from the nearest shop and pub and the port of Uig where the ferry leaves for the Outer Hebrides.

homes_name: Papillon Bed & Breakfast Compact Twin Room
homes_overviews: All guest rooms enjoy stunning views overlooking Loch Vatten and the Macleods Tables Mountains.

Family room double bed and single suitable for 3 persons - en suite toilet, wash hand basin, and shower. Tea/coffee making facilities in room . Hairdryer is also available. Full Scottish Breakfast is included.

Central and close to all the shops, bars and restaurants of Portree, "Assynt Cottage" is the perfect base for a holiday on the Isle of Skye. Super location for exploring all the attractions of the island. A modern and all newly refurbished and decorated holiday home, available for short and longer stays. You will enjoy a high standard of comfort and fascilities at "Assynt", with wifi, smart TV, modern kitchen, bright spaces and comfortable beds. 5 minute walk to town centre.
Guidebooks and maps are also provided.

Welcome! Our house (The Willows) is nestled in a prominent position in the centre of the village of Tarskavaig. The Willows is a modern croft house set inside a traditional operating croft. My wife and I live here with our two young children, dog and three cats. We also have two cows and a flock of hens. Tarskavaig offers a unique feel of traditional crofting life along with a very quiet and peaceful backdrop, so is the perfect place to come for a relaxing 'get away from it all' holiday.
The property is a self-contained luxury Pod and boasts a comfortable and private open plan kitchen and living space, together with an en-suite with shower.

A cosy glamping wigwam for up to 4 people (ideal for family of 4 or 3 adult friends. Part of Whitewave: Skye's Outdoor Centre, this scenic destination is perfect for friends, couples and families wanting to make the most of the surrounding landscape.
Please note; We do have two little boys ourselves! One aged 6 and the other 2!!
* We've a dog who likes to woof but she's very friendly:)

homes_name: Central Skye; Great location for exploring Skye
homes_overviews: Fantastic location & beautiful house on Skye. Sconser is halfway between Portree and Broadford, and close to the Fairy Pools/Dunvegan/Talisker turnoff while being only half a mile from the Raasay ferry terminal. Your room is spacious with a comfortable bed and has tables/wardrobe space. Having full access to the house and gardens you can relax or potter around. Wifi access is available and there is fantastic 4G coverage. We have 2 pet house rabbits, Millie & Jessica, who will greet on arrival!

homes_name: B&B Keeper`s Cottage, Glendrynoch Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Located in Glendrynoch, Minginish with stunning views to the Cuillin Hills, 5 minutes away from the famous Talisker Distillery and 15 minutes away from Glen Brittle.

homes_name: Cosy self contained cabin in Shieldaig
homes_overviews: Rosebank Cabin is clean and comfortable with all the basic requirements for overnight stays.Located in the garden behind Rosebank. Ideal for stop if you are travelling the North Coast 500 Route.close to the sea and only a few minutes walk to small village shop.Come meet the locals in the village bar and dine on freshly caught langoustines.Enjoy walking around the local area and maybe catch a glimpse of the stunning Sea Eagles that live on Shieldaig Island,then to Nanny's for delicious coffee.

This is a comfortable bedroom with a small double bed (measures 1.2m x 1.9m) with en-suite bathroom and conservatory/lounge with its own private entrance. The room is adjoined to our family home, where we live with our two children. In the bright, airy sunroom there is a sofa and television as well as a dining area. The self serve continental breakfast includes tea, coffee, cereal, bread, butter and jam along with a kettle, toaster and fridge.
The Uig Hotel is one of the most popular hotels on the magical Isle of Skye. The Hotel sits above Uig Bay on the Trotternish peninsula and all but three of the eleven rooms offer fantastic bay views.

Pipers Cottage is a modernised but traditional croft house that was once home to a famous local piper. Pipers has bags of character and is a lovely cosy place to stay, Situated in the heart of Broadford.
lots of Skye Books for you to peruse and local knowledge over a coffee.

Our room is situated on the main street of Portree, which is the capital of the Isle of Skye. We are ideally situated close to all bars and restaurants and although we do not have a car park, there are 3 car parks available within walking distance. All our rooms are self check in and the main entrance can be found directly opposite the Tongadale Hotel and next door to Stewarts the Knitwear.

homes_name: Central Skye, great base for exploring the island
homes_overviews: Fantastic location & beautiful house on Skye. Sconser is halfway between Portree and Broadford, and close to the Fairy Pools/Dunvegan/Talisker turnoff while being only half a mile from the Raasay ferry terminal. Your room is spacious with a comfortable bed and has tables/wardrobe space. Having full access to the house and gardens you can relax or potter around. Wifi access is available and there is fantastic 4G coverage. We have 2 pet house rabbits, Millie & Jessica, who will greet on arrival!
10% discount on Tearoom menu, gluten free and vegetarian products available

homes_name: Bracken Brae B&B (Room 3) Luxury room, sea view!
homes_overviews: Situated on a hill we have unsurpassed, panoramic views across the sea to the Mainland. At our brand new luxury annex you can relax in large, stylish and beautiful bedrooms with your own private outdoor covered deck, and luxury shower room with underfloor heating and a luxuriant hot waterfall shower.

homes_name: 33 Lochbay Bed and Breakfast Sea Views
homes_overviews: Traditional croft house with modern comforts. Newly renovated bright and airy guest room with quality finishes, 40â€?tv, complimentary tea and coffee facilities, hair dryer and luxury bathroom with far reaching views across the sea to the Outer Hebrides.

The Old Store is a cottage situated in Camusterrach bay, in Applecross which looks across the Inner Sound towards Skye and the Cullin mountains. It is a cosy single story house in a traditional Highland style but with all the mod cons.
Cosy house in traditional wood with woodburning stove etc. Great sea and mountain views. Home cooking meals on request. Run as a traditional bed and breakfast.
The property is right in the heart of Portree, only two minutes walk from shops, restaurants and bus stop.

homes_name: Feochan B&B Portree Skye - Family / Twin Room Rm 1
homes_overviews: Beautiful B&B set in a Stunning Prime Location in Pretty Portree - Isle of Skye. A very warm welcome awaits you.

homes_name: Luxury bedroom overlooking the Cuillin mountains.
homes_overviews: Luxury double room with beautiful views of the Cuillin mountains to the west and sea views of the small isles to the south. Bright, spacious and comfortable space with Juliet balcony overlooking Blaven.
A modern comfortable 3 bedroom , 3 bathroom house with all the luxuries you would expect that is in walking distance of restaurants and bars. Nice and close to the shore for a bit of walking too.

homes_name: Ardmorn B&B King size bed with en-suite
homes_overviews: We are a family run B&B based 2.5 miles from Dunvegan, we can sleep up to 9 people with our flexible accommodation. We are only a short drive to the castle and the beautiful coral beach. Using your car we are nicely placed to visit fairy pools, or visit Neist Point. Portree is just over 20 miles away, where you can see the Town and visit the Trotternish ridge, and journey around the Trottenish loop, to visit Kilt Rock and Staffin bay to see the dinosaur foot prints

A bright and airy double bedroom with its own bathroom in a private family home less then a mile from the centre of Portree with on site parking and wifi. We don't provide breakfast. We do have tea and coffee making facilities and a table for you to eat at. Please note this is a family home, with two children and a dog. All are friendly!
We offer one double bed and sofa bed suitable for one person. (linen provided for double bed only). Private Parking,Private Garden

homes_name: Self catering at the Breakish Horse
homes_overviews: Enjoy a sea view and handy location just 5 miles after the Skye Bridge and 2 miles from Broadford. We offer a 2 bedroom self catering cabin suitable for 2 or 3 people with sheep outside the window. Located in a peaceful position set back away from the main road in Breakish. We are easy to find but please read the directions carefully! Alternatively search for Breakish Horse on Ggle. Maps.

Our warm and comfortable double ensuite bedroom is a perfect place to stay with amazing views. We are based in Carbost at the foot of our majestic mountains the Cuillins. Old Trien House is at the end of the loch and an easy base as it's quite central to Skye's world famous attractions. We're not far from the Talisker distillery (20min walk) should you choose to have a dram and listen to the live music and taste local ales in The Old Inn. They do food all day long too.

homes_name: Self Catering Cabin in the South of Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Please note: We offer a back to nature experience with compost toilets, not 5*

A truly one of a kind private holiday cottage located on the breathtakingly beautiful and mystical Isle of Skye. Dark Skye Cottage offers the perfect romantic getaway for two who want to escape the buzz of everyday life for a holiday on one of Scotlandâ€™s most sought after Islands. It offers the perfect balance of seclusion while still only a short walk from one of Skyeâ€™s most desirable villages.

homes_name: Caravan at the Edge of the World
homes_overviews: Our quirky caravan is really cosy with lots of character. Its 10 mins from the beach & buses to Portree 3 times a day. You can see the Quiraing ridge,the Museum of Crofting Life,the graves of Flora MacDonald and the fashion designer Alexander McQueen and MacCurdies for amusing insights into local (URL HIDDEN) place is perfect for family & pets, couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.

homes_name: Taigh Rob Room 1 Thistle ( Double room )
homes_overviews: There is an electric kettle available for boiling water for a selection of herbal teas provided. A coffee machine and a selection of coffee pods is also available.

Croft 29 Chalet' is new for 2018 and set in the beautiful area of Kilmuir, north Skye - just 10 minutes north of Uig. The chalet sleeps 2 (or 3) with a double bed, and the option of a pull-out sofa bed (which sleeps 1). Spacious shower-room, and separate living area with picture window which includes a kitchenette (sink, kettle, fridge, microwave). Outside there is a decking area and hammock so you can enjoy the peaceful surroundings and stunning views over the Minch to the Western Isles

Welcome! Our house (The Willows) is nestled in a prominent position in the centre of the village of Tarskavaig. The Willows is a modern croft house set inside a traditional operating croft. My wife and I live here with our two young children, dog and two cats. We also have two cows and a flock of hens. Tarskavaig offers a unique feel of traditional crofting life along with a very quiet and peaceful backdrop, so is the perfect place to come for a relaxing 'get away from it all' holiday.

we have a self contained flat located in the beautiful village of breakish.The view from the front windows over looks the sea and also have the world famous cuillins in the background with outstanding scenery.Centrally located with a 5 minute walk to a sandy beach and a 5 minute drive to the village of broadford which has all local ammeneties.

Central and close to all the shops, bars and restaurants of Portree, "Assynt Cottage" is the perfect base for a holiday on the Isle of Skye. Super location for exploring all the attractions of the island. A modern and all newly refurbished and decorated holiday home, available for short and longer stays. You will enjoy a high standard of comfort and fascilities at "Assynt", with wifi, smart TV, modern kitchen, bright spaces and comfortable beds. 5 minute walk to town centre.

homes_name: Suilven Elgol Isle of Skye Bed & Breakfast
homes_overviews: If you have bikes you can leave them in the shed overnight and if caught out in the Skye weather we have a drying room.

homes_name: Suilven Elgol Isle of Skye Bed & Breakfast
Cosy double room in the heart of Kyle of Lochalsh
homes_overviews: Fantastic views over Kyleakin, Skye from your window.

PLEASE NOTE:- we are 5 miles from the nearest village of Uig. This is a 2/4 person caravan situated in our garden, 1 double bed and seating can be used as 2 singles/king size bed with linen provided. There is a gas cooker and microwave. The shower room is a few steps away in our home and is shared. The caravan is self-catering basis, no food is provided. Enjoy the silence, landscape and beautiful walks on the North tip of Skye. Close to Rubha Hunish, the most northerly tip on Skye and .
Youâ€™ll love my place because of the views, the people, the location, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples.

Our warm and comfortable king size bedroom is a perfect place to stay with amazing views. We are based in Carbost at the foot of our majestic mountains the Cuillins. Old Trien House is at the end of the loch and an easy base as it's quite central to Skye's world famous attractions. We're not far from the Talisker distillery (20min walk) should you choose to have a dram and listen to the live music and taste local ales in The Old Inn. They do food all day long too.
***A complimentary breakfast is available at The Portree Hotel for all guests***
This sunny south facing annexe is situated on the edge of Waterloo Boatyard in the crofting township of Waterloo or Achaidhiurn (place of the Cairn).

homes_name: Taigh An Uillt B&B Breakish Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Taigh An Uillt B&B is the perfect location for jumping on and off the Island!

homes_name: Cosy Wooden Cabin and Barrel on Secluded Island
homes_overviews: Recommended in Rough Guide, Observer, and The Times Travel, our Cabin and Barrel are an excellent space for couples or families to experience our magical little corner of the Scottish Highlands here on our historic family-owned island.
The Uig Hotel is one of the most popular hotels on the magical Isle of Skye. The Hotel sits above Uig Bay on the Trotternish peninsula and all but three of the eleven rooms offer fantastic bay views.
Continental breakfast included.

homes_name: Feochan B&B Portree Skye - Family / Twin Room Rm 4
homes_overviews: Beautiful B&B set in a Stunning Prime Location in Pretty Portree - Isle of Skye. A very warm welcome awaits you.

Island croft house that combines traditional stone built exterior with newly refurbished interior - wooden floors, breakfast bar, wood-burning stove and under floor heating. Stunning views of the Hebridean Isles. 5 miles from ferry terminal.

homes_name: Fernlea Bed and Breakfast, Isle of Skye, Room S2
homes_overviews: Fernlea offers home cooked locally sourced breakfast and has large comfortable rooms with en suites.

Our room is situated on the main street of Portree, which is the capital of the Isle of Skye. We are ideally situated close to all bars and restaurants and although we do not have a car park, there are 3 car parks available within walking distance. All our rooms are self check ( keys left in door for your arrival) in and the main entrance can be found directly opposite the Tongadale Hotel and next door to Stewarts the Knitwear.

homes_name: Quiet area, close to the centre of Portree.
homes_overviews: My home is situated in a quiet cul-de-sac close to Portree. I offer a double room and have a single room available. I enjoy hosting and use my two spare rooms to welcome you to the beautiful island of Skye. There is tea/coffee facilities in your room and breakfast is included in the price. My home is peaceful which should ensure you of a good nights sleep, for your busy travels ahead.

homes_name: Eilean Mara, Double room, Bernisdale near Portree
homes_overviews: We are unable to offer a cooked breakfast but will provide some complimentary breakfast items to start your day in your room along with tea and coffee.

homes_name: Sun Room - at Skeabost Bridge. (Room only)
homes_overviews: (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps will send you incorrectly to the wrong location. We will send you photos on how to get to the house the day of arrival.
Our double room with en-suite facilities can accommodate a maximum of 2 people.

homes_name: Lovely Ensuite King Room at Applecross B&B
homes_overviews: Situated on the remote Applecross Peninsula on the NC500. We are in the peaceful crofting township of Toscaig just 4 miles from the world renowned Applecross Inn. Newly opened and completely refurbished, our property has 4 en suite rooms and 2 with a shared bathroom .High quality bed linen and king sized beds makes this a very comfortable base for your holiday. A full cooked breakfast is served and we source as much of our produce locally as we can.

Lovely bed and breakfast in a beautiful crofting village with amazing views of Skye and Applecross. Traditional crofting is still a way of life with cattle and sheep roaming freely. Gorgeous coastal walks where you might see otters and seals.
Our spacious family room with private facilities can accommodate up to 4 people.

Set in a stunning and peaceful location on The Isle of Skye, Boatbuilder's Cottage provides the perfect retreat for boat lovers and marine enthusiasts. This charming stone cottage built in 1886 is situated on the edge of Waterloo Boatyard, looking out over Broadford Bay. There is a beach, slip and a tidal mooring just in front of the cottage. We can provide additional parking space to store boat trailers if you want to bring your own boat.

homes_name: Comfortable Ensuite King Room at Applecross B&B
homes_overviews: Situated on the remote Applecross Peninsula on the NC500. We are in the peaceful crofting township of Toscaig just 4 miles from the world renowned Applecross Inn. Newly opened and completely refurbished, our property has 4 en suite rooms and 2 with a shared bathroom .High quality bed linen and king sized beds makes this a very comfortable base for your holiday. A full cooked breakfast is served and we source as much of our produce locally as we can.

homes_name: Fernlea B&B Isle of Skye, Highlands. Room P1
homes_overviews: We offer home cooked locally sourced breakfast and has large comfortable rooms with en suites.

homes_name: Large ensuite room & seaview at the Breakish Horse
homes_overviews: Our place is distinctive due to the life size plastic horse at the roadside. The room is a large, comfortable, en-suite double with sea & countryside views, a wonderful destination after a busy day. We are 5 miles from the Skye Bridge & 2 miles to Broadford. A light breakfast is provided in the room, tea and coffee making facilities are included. There is a sofa to relax, watch some TV or just unwind.
The space: We have two very spacious king size bedrooms, each with their own en suite with rainfall showers. Guests are free to use the lounge.

Central and close to all the shops, bars and restaurants of Portree, "Assynt cottage" is the perfect base for a holiday on the Isle of Skye. Super location for exploring all the attractions of the island. A modern and all newly refurbished and decorated holiday home, available for short and longer stays. You will enjoy a high standard of comfort and fascilities at "Assynt", with wifi, smart TV, modern kitchen, bright spaces and comfortable beds. 5 minute walk to town centre.

Look forward to a warm comfortable stay in a beautiful quiet location on a working croft with a view of the Macleod's Tables. Continental breakfast included. A short drive from Uig where the ferry leaves for the Outer Isles and day trips to St Kilda are available. Excellent for walking and fishing.

homes_name: Contemporary Cottage with stunning Cuillin Views
homes_overviews: The Sligachan Cottage is a newly refurbished and contemporary building, located in one of the most beautiful places in Scotland. The spacious cottage has a large open-plan kitchen, living and dining area. The cottage benefits from glass-fronted views over-looking the Cuillin, with a cosy log burning stove to enjoy sitting by the fire and admiring the wild Highland scenery. The cottage consists of 3 x bedrooms and an additional mezzanine level if extra beds are required (sleeping up to 8 people).

homes_name: Ensuite King Room 3 at Applecross B&B
homes_overviews: Situated on the remote Applecross Peninsula on the NC500. We are in the peaceful crofting township of Toscaig just 4 miles from the world renowned Applecross Inn. Newly opened and completely refurbished, our property has 4 en suite rooms and 2 with a shared bathroom .High quality bed linen and king sized beds makes this a very comfortable base for your holiday. A full cooked breakfast is served and we source as much of our produce locally as we can.
The Uig Hotel is one of the most popular hotels on the magical Isle of Skye. The Hotel sits above Uig Bay on the Trotternish peninsula and all but three of the eleven rooms offer fantastic bay views.

homes_name: The purple room at Strathallan B&B
homes_overviews: At Strathallan bed and breakfast the purple room is a luxury welcoming room for two with fabulous king-size bed, en-suite bathroom and views across to the Cuillin mountains. It is our only letting room so you are guaranteed a personal service.
Spacious twin room with en-suite facilities.
My place is close to Winkle beach , nightlife, public transport, parks.

Our room is situated on the main street of Portree, which is the capital of the Isle of Skye. We are ideally situated close to all bars and restaurants and although we do not have a car park, there are 3 car parks available within walking distance. All our rooms are self check in and the main entrance can be found directly opposite the Tongadale Hotel and next door to Stewarts the Knitwear.

homes_name: Waterside Cottage, by the sea, Skye
homes_overviews: 1 king, 2 doubles and 1 twin room, sleeps up to 8.

homes_name: Suilven Elgol Isle of Skye Pod
homes_overviews: Bikes can be put in shed
you also have use of the decking at the rear of the house - feel free to use this area for barbecues or smoking- weather permitting
Evening meals at an extra cost can be provided prior to arrangement.

homes_name: Central Skye, self contained flat - great location
homes_overviews: Self contained private flat in perfect location for exploring Skye. The flat is cosy and comfortably sleeps 2 people in the bedroom while you can also pull out the sofa bed and sleep 2 more making it suitable for families. Sconser is in central Skye and is midway between Portree and Broadford, close to the turnoff for Fairy Pools, Talisker, Dunvegan and only half a mile to the Raasay ferry. We're available for any advice you need to help you enjoy your stay! Free Wifi and excellent 4G coverage. Windows are placed quite high but can be opened for better views.

homes_name: Upper Diabaig Farm King Size with en suite
homes_overviews: Breakfast is provided at a time to suit you and includes cooked options, fresh fruit and homemade preserves.

homes_name: Skye Eco Bells Glamping - Cosy Island Cabin 3
homes_overviews: Furnished cosy cabin sleeps up to 3 in a double and single bed. Sit by your outdoor firepit after exploring the beauty of Skye or relax in the comfort of your cabin warmed by the wood burning stove. Compost toilet, the unique greenhouse shower and sociable Hub and Shack are all part of the off grid experience. Up to 2 well behaved dogs are welcome by prior arrangement for an additional Â£10 for one dog and Â£15 for two..

Canna Bunkhouse looks out towards Rum and Sanday. Check the Calmac Small Isles ferry timetable before booking. Â£15 per night per person. There is 1 room with 2 bunks and a 6 bed shared dorm. It has a kitchen, toilet/shower and a wood burning stove/electricity and gas.There is no road so luggage must be carried half a mile. We make sure there are supplies of milk, oil, sugar, salt, pepper and teabags so you don't have to carry those!
Portree is a great base for exploring the North of Skye. The house around 125 years old and full of character.
Twin room with sea veiw and private Bathroom

homes_overviews: Breakfast is provided at a time to suit you and includes cooked options, fresh fruit and homemade preserves.

homes_name: 2 beds in a shared dorm at the Sligachan Bunkhouse
homes_overviews: The Sligachan Bunkhouse offers comfortable accommodation for those on a budget or with an appetite for the great outdoors. This listing is for 2 beds in a shared mixed dorm. Guests also have access to a shared shower room & WC (which is unisex), full kitchen facilities and a living room with open fire. Wifi is available in the bunkhouse but can be a little weak at times due out our remote location. What really makes the Sligachan Bunkhouse special? It's unbeatably beautiful location!
We are centrally located to explore the island,many nearby facilities, Pubs, Restaurants, Fuel station and Supermarket, Post office, and Medical center.

homes_name: Craigh Na Dun Holiday Cottage in central Skye
homes_overviews: Our house is comfortably furnished with both a modern and traditional feel. We are located in a traditional crofting village in the middle of a deer farm. Relax and enjoy your stay.
If you have no car, we are a 5 minute walk from both the train station and the bus terminus.

homes_name: Rowan Cottage - at the end of the winding road
homes_overviews: A traditional Highland croft located in Glasnakille on the Strathaird Peninsula 2 miles for Elgol. Rowan Cottage is already a well established B&B. Tariff includes Continental breakfast but for a hearty cooked breakfast there is a charge of Â£2/5. Scottish rustic supper meals provided if required. Twin bedded room, ensuite.Guest lounge with TV, small library and board games. Free WiFi. Spacious garden for session of chillax if the weather is fine.

homes_name: 3. Sea Front Twin Room, Kyleakin, Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Situated in the picturesque fishing village of Kyleakin, this twin en-suite room overlooks the sea and mountains. Includes TV, free wi-fi, tea/coffee and cooked breakfast served in the conservatory with stunning views over sea.

homes_name: 2. Sea view, Twin En-suite, Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Situated in the picturesque fishing village of Kyleakin, this twin en-suite room overlooks the sea and mountains. Includes TV, free wi-fi, tea/coffee and a cooked breakfast served in the conservatory with stunning views over sea. Each room has its own individual table for guests to relax and enjoy the views.

homes_name: Yurt In The Heart of the West Highlands
homes_overviews: Our small camping Yurt is set on a traditional working croft on the west cost of Scotland, 5 minutes walk from a secluded sandy beach and surrounded by stunning scenery. It offers simple accommodation with minimal environmental impact and is a great base from which to experience all that the Highlands have to offer.

homes_name: The Stables Cottage, Isle of Skye
homes_overviews: Available per night and also long stay Self Catering.

Quant cabin gently nestled into the historic family-run Dry Island. "Otter Cabin" is fitted out to a high standard with a double bedroom, shower room, open plan kitchen and living room and its own decking area. This is a traditional self-catering unit. Kitchen supplies and linens are provided, and towels are available upon request. High-speed wifi is available. Unfortunately, the cabin is inaccessible to those with mobility difficulties.
